content: May it embellish your planet from the branches of the Luca Arbor, and may the blessings of the starry sky bring you good fortune always~
info: NPC成长等级-6级演出-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: {A小害羞}Yeep-yip. Actually, I wanted to give you this <style=Highlight>Luca Fruit: Shimmering Seas</style>, my best friend!
info: NPC成长等级-6级演出-1005幻雪_幻雪

content: {A想象}Have you ever seen the waves shimmer with a quivering glow? It's as if a glittering veil were draped across the sea. Stare too long and you'll start to feel the pull, an invitation...
info: NPC成长等级-6级演出-1005幻雪_幻雪
